attributes.title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare Holds Modern Warfare HOSTAGE!
attributes.caption: Oct 3, 2016
attributes.description: It's October now, and that means game news is getting scary. Not intentionally. It just worked out that way. If you thought you could recoup some of your $80 investment in Infinite Warfare by trading it in and keeping Modern Warfare Remastered... Activision's got your number and they're not going to let you do it, based on new details of how access will work.
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare Holds Modern Warfare HOSTAGE!

attributes.title: Developer VS Let's Plays?
attributes.caption: Mar 28, 2016
attributes.description: The developer of That Dragon, Cancer is taking aim at Let's Plays, blaming them for the game's poor sales. Look, we can't poke fun at a game made by a father grieving over the loss of his son. We're assholes, but there are limits. However, maybe people are touchy about playing games that tackle such heavy topics so openly? WE DON'T PLAY GAMES TO FEEL, MAN. PS: Fuck cancer.

attributes.title: Digital Homicide OUT OF BUSINESS
attributes.caption: Oct 3, 2016
attributes.description: Hooboy. You know those developers who sued game critic Jim (f%ing) Sterling (son) and then sued Steam gamers and then sued Valve? This might be a surprise, but they're closing up shop. Yeah, we were all shocked.

attributes.title: Google's Next Phone LEAKS!
attributes.caption: But does it come with headphones you can instantly lose?

It's a glorious day, because apparently Grand Theft Auto 6 is in development. Sure, you can file this one under "no shit," but it's nice to hear confirmation regardless.

It's only a matter of time before everybody else wants you to buy their hats, too.

attributes.description: Gears of War 4 is actually not the fourth game in the series but we'll let that slide because counting is hard. All we really want to know is if the game lives up to the whole Mad World aesthetic the original game's trailer promised... IS IT GOOD?

attributes.title: Teen hacks Steam
attributes.description: Gosh darn teenagers, what wont they hack? This time it looks like a 16 year old has managed to hack is way into Steam, with some interesting results.

attributes.caption: Mar 31, 2016
attributes.description: A Nintendo marketing representative has been let go from Nintendo, and she blames constant harassment from gamers. Except... there seems to be a bit more to it. Boy, this one should go over well.

attributes.title: Half-life VR LEAKS?
attributes.caption: Oct 10, 2016
attributes.description: Either Valve are the biggest trolls in the world, which is entirely possible because they love treating us mean and keeping us keen, or some recent game updates are hinting at the existence of Half-life VR.

attributes.title: NO HALO on PC?
attributes.caption: Apr 1, 2016
attributes.description: Boy, Xbox chief Phil Spencer is a big supporter of PC gaming, huh? Wait... what do you mean he still doesn't want to put Halo on PC? That's weird.

attributes.title: No Man's Sky MOST HATED on Steam
attributes.caption: Oct 10, 2016
attributes.description: What does it take to get Steam's lowest possible rating? Be a highly anticipated game that isn't all it cracked up to be, add a dash of furious gamers who want to be heard, and then take the developers off the internet so the only outlet for feedback is the ole gladiator thumbs down.
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky MOST HATED on Steam

attributes.title: April Fools Roundup - The Know

attributes.title: Mafia 3: Does It SUCK (and did 2K know)?
attributes.caption: Oct 11, 2016
attributes.description: It took a while for Mafia 3 reviews to start coming in, since 2K didn't send early copies to critics. Now that they're here, though, they're not very favorable. Suspicious.
attributes.display_title: Mafia 3: Does It SUCK (and did 2K know)?

attributes.title: Dark Souls III: Is it Good?
attributes.description: Is the new installation in the dark souls series to die for? Find out what the critics think.

attributes.title: People HATE Uncharted 4's Ending?
attributes.description: Uncharted 4 is reportedly going to have a "divisive" ending. What could this mean for Nathan Drake?

attributes.title: Know Before You Go... Battlefield 1

attributes.description: Battlefield 1 takes the franchise into World War 1, exploring theaters of war around the world. Here's an overview of everything you can expect from the game.

attributes.title: Know Before You Go... Civilization VI

attributes.display_title: Know Before You Go... Civilization VI

attributes.title: Final Fantasy VII a RIP-OFF?
attributes.description: Will the fantasy ever be final? Not if Square Enix has its way, as they confirm that the Final Fantasy 7 remake will be multiple full price games.

attributes.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 INCOMING
attributes.caption: Oct 17, 2016
attributes.description: Oh Rockstar. You treat us mean and we stay keen. Just give us that sweet sweet Red Dead Redemption 2 or Red Dead 3 or whatever we're calling it and we won't ask for anything else except Red Dead 4 and maybe some more GTA games because let's face it... enough is never enough.

attributes.title: Quantum Break BROKEN?
attributes.description: Is Quantum Break a shit-show of a PC port?

attributes.title: Battlefield: Is It Good?
attributes.caption: Oct 17, 2016
attributes.description: Battlefield 1 is out this week! You've seen the overview. You've watched Burnie get a contact high playing the game at E3. You've maybe even watched a trailer. But do you know...IS IT GOOD? If you don't, we've got you covered.

attributes.title: VR Launch in TROUBLE?
attributes.caption: Apr 8, 2016
attributes.description: Congratulations, you bought a VR! When do you get it? WE DON'T KNOW? ISN'T THAT GREAT? You bought a game for your VR and it SUCKS? Whoops. Isn't being an early adopter fun?We mock because we're jealous. Please give us a VR.Sponsored By: Loot Anime!Get $3 off any new subscription when you use offer code THEKNOW.

attributes.title: Diablo 4 Reveal at Blizzcon 2016?
attributes.caption: We're about to go down a very nerdy rabbit hole.
attributes.description: This is one of those long and winding road type stories, so stay a while and listen.

attributes.title: Link's a GIRL? On the NX?
attributes.description: As long as Link looks like the thumbnail, we're pretty sure nobody will care. Here comes the Hero of Time wearing the Hero's Bikini! Quick, Link, use your gadgets to beat the boss! Bust out the tactical suntan lotion!
attributes.display_title: Link's a GIRL? On the NX?

attributes.title: Pokemon Sun and Moon Leaks
attributes.caption: Nov 9, 2016
attributes.description: The game's not out until next week, but of course it's leaked onto the internet early, which means data mining and spoilers galore.

attributes.title: Nintendo Switch OFFICIALLY REVEALED
attributes.caption: Oct 20, 2016
attributes.description: We've been rumoring and leaking this thing for more than a year at this point, but now Nintendo NX has been officially revealed as Nintendo Switch and it's... well, it's everything we thought it was going to be. Here's everything we know about it so far. How it will work. What it might cost. All the games.

attributes.title: Twitch Streamer vs Sick Kids
attributes.caption: Apr 11, 2016
attributes.description: Someone said something dumb? STOP THE PRESSES. This time it's a Twitch streamer, who may have celebrated a little bit too much during a fundraiser for children's cancer research and explained to all of us just why these kids are doomed. PLS DONATE!

attributes.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Trailer CONFIRMS First Details
attributes.caption: Oct 20, 2016
attributes.description: On the first day, Rockstar teased something red. On the second day, Rockstar made some cowboys. On the third day, Rockstar made Red Dead 3 devotees angry by naming the game Red Dead Redemption 2. On the fourth day they took a break and looked at their good work. On the fifth day, They showed us pretty trailers. And it was good.
attributes.display_title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Trailer CONFIRMS First Details

attributes.title: Evolution Studios SAVED!
attributes.caption: Violating our negative-only news mandate for once.
attributes.description: We have the rare privilege of reporting entirely positive news today! The only catch is that probably nobody cares about racing games. Whatever. Welcome back Evolution Studios!

attributes.title: Nintendo Switch Faces BACKLASH
attributes.caption: Oct 21, 2016
attributes.description: Well, we had one positive day. Sort of. But today is a new day, and Nintendo's newly unveiled Switch console is facing some backlash over innovation, missing features, battery life, and lack of communication.

attributes.title: Your Gender DECIDED!
attributes.caption: Apr 11, 2016
attributes.description: Character customization? Nah. Choice? Nah. You know what you want in games? Realism! Rust is giving you everything you've ever wanted by taking away everything you've ever wanted! A new update assigns attributes to player avatars, including race and gender. Still has dick sliders too though.

attributes.title: Video Game Voice Actors ON STRIKE
attributes.caption: Oct 21, 2016
attributes.description: Get ready for a bunch of amateur performances, picketing, posturing, politics, and eventual compromises. SAG-AFTRA, the union that represents voice actors, has instituted a strike against video games that could impact Red Dead Redemption 2, Destiny, Call of Duty, and other major franchises. And it's effective NOW.
attributes.display_title: Video Game Voice Actors ON STRIKE

attributes.title: New Xbox Hardware THIS YEAR?
attributes.caption: Apr 12, 2016
attributes.description: Could Microsoft be planning for an Xbox 1.5 after all? Filings with the FCC indicate they've got some new Xbox hardware up their sleeve, for a reveal in June. What else is in June? Oh, that's right. E3!

attributes.title: Know Before You Go... Titanfall 2
attributes.caption: Oct 23, 2016
attributes.description: Titanfall 2 comes out this week with new modes, features, campaign, and a ton of new titans. Want to find out what's new and different from the first game? Here's everything you need to know.

attributes.title: GTA Boss & Rockstar SUE EACH OTHER
attributes.description: Grant Theft Litigation! Former Rockstar North studio head and GTA series producer Leslie Benzies is suing the company for millions of dollars. Rockstar's response to this? Sue him right back.
attributes.display_title: GTA Boss & Rockstar SUE EACH OTHER

attributes.title: Hidden Nintendo Switch Secrets Uncovered?
attributes.caption: Oct 24, 2016
attributes.description: Nintendo may not be ready to share more details about their newly unveiled Switch console, but lucky for us there's a trailer to analyze frame by frame and patents that may shed more light on what the console has to offer.Sponsor: Dollar Shave ClubGet your first month free (you just pay shipping!) Then there are no commitments and no hidden fees.

attributes.title: GTA Online Makes $500 MILLION - The Know
attributes.caption: Single player DLC when? Never.
attributes.description: A recent lawsuit has revealed GTA Online's revenues, and holy hell is it a lot. Who knew that selling hats made so much money? Oh wait, basically everyone.
attributes.display_title: GTA Online Makes $500 MILLION - The Know

attributes.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Out of Money?! - The Know
attributes.caption: "We shouldn't jump to any cyber-conclusions."
attributes.description: CD Projekt has applied for additional funding to help Cyberpunk 2077 development. Does this mean the game's in trouble?
attributes.display_title: Cyberpunk 2077 Out of Money?! - The Know

attributes.title: NX Launch Titles Leaked?
attributes.caption: Apr 13, 2016
attributes.description: Hey more Nintendo NX rumors, this time its launch titles. Will the NX launch lineup be full of Wii U ports? New leaks suggest it will.

attributes.title: Titanfall 2: IS IT GOOD?
attributes.caption: Oct 25, 2016
attributes.description: You've seen the Know Before You Go and you know what the features are. You've seen Real Steel and you could beat up Hugh Jackman. Now you want to do it in space. Titanfall 2 is out this week, reviews are coming in, and now we have an answer to your biggest question... is it GOOD?

attributes.title: Blizzard Entertainment DDoS ATTACK
attributes.caption: Apr 14, 2016
attributes.description: What do you do when you're mad on the internet? You store up cereal box tokens and send away for a decoder ring! THEN you use that decoder ring to signal the DDoS Lizard people or whatever. Then you sit back and wait for whoever you're mad at to change their mind and do what you want. Apparently.

attributes.title: GTA V DLC NEVER Coming Out?
attributes.caption: Oct 25, 2016
attributes.description: After years of waiting for some kind of content for GTA V, it looks like that may never happen because Rockstar makes too much money from GTA Online.
attributes.display_title: GTA V DLC NEVER Coming Out?

attributes.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 MAP LEAKED?
attributes.caption: That's almost as exciting as an instruction manual leak.
attributes.description: Leaks and rumors are mounting for Red Dead Redemption 2. If it's real, this is our first look at the game's setting and environment. But is it real? The Internet... says no. But then yes.

attributes.title: Everybody HATES Doom?
attributes.description: The public beta for the new Doom game has launched and the user reviews are... less than stellar. Does this spell doom for the game's full launch? Can bad betas seriously hurt game sales?

attributes.title: Is This Xbox Scorpio VR?
attributes.caption: Oct 27, 2016
attributes.description: Xbox One Scorpio isn't coming until next year, but Microsoft just announced an entire line of VR headsets that will be compatible with Windows 10. Wait... Xbox One is now running Windows 10... Is this their answer to PlayStation VR?

attributes.title: Game Reviews are DEAD?
attributes.caption: Oct 26, 2016
attributes.description: A lot of games lately have declined to send out early review copies. Bethesda has doubled down on that policy by making it official. No more early review copies. Early promotional copies, though? Yeah, those are full steam ahead. It's raising questions about the place of game reviews for consumers and ethics on the part of video game companies. Let's talk about that.

attributes.title: Division Players PUNISHED?
attributes.description: Demerits for the Division? A exploit in Ubisoft's online shooter RPG has allowed players to gain high level gear with little effort. This has caused some turmoil for the in-game economy. Ubisoft has threatened bans for players using these exploits. What does this mean for the future of the Devision?

attributes.title: GameStop to Publish, RUIN GAMES?
attributes.caption: Because they ruin everything, apparently.
attributes.description: Probably not ruin, but nobody clicks on this stuff unless we put an all-capped negative word in the title. GameTrust sounds like a good deal for everyone, but that's how it always starts out isn't it? Pretty soon they'll be giving you five dollars for your brand new IP that you only bought yesterday god dammit.    SOURCES:  Song of the Deep Announcement  GamesIndustry.biz Interview  Gamasutra Interview  GameStop Acquires ThinkGeek  GameStop Acquires Kongregate

attributes.title: Hello Games: "No Man's Sky Was a MISTAKE" ...was it hacked?
attributes.caption: Oct 28, 2016
attributes.description: Hello Games has broken its long silence on Twitter by admitting the game was a "mistake." Then it gets weird.
attributes.display_title: Hello Games: "No Man's Sky Was a MISTAKE" ...was it hacked?

attributes.title: PS4.5 Called NEO, Specs REVEALED
attributes.description: The rumored PS4.5 has a shiny new codename, "Neo". Yeah like from the Matrix. That is not the real news here though, it's what's inside that counts. We have information on specs for the new hardware. Will this new Playstation be the chosen one?

attributes.title: Know Before You Go... Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare
attributes.caption: Oct 29, 2016
attributes.description: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare is taking the series to space in the most controversial move yet for the series. Lucky for them, it's also got zombies and Modern Warfare 2. Curious about what the game includes? Here's everything you need to know.
attributes.display_title: Know Before You Go... Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare

attributes.title: No More New Consoles?
attributes.caption: Apr 20, 2016
attributes.description: Maybe we owe Michael Pachter an apology for making fun of him when he said there wouldn't be any more console generations because... even Sony's not sure they'll make another one. Sorry, Mike!Sponsored By: Loot Anime.

attributes.title: Titanfall 2 EXPECTED to FAIL?
attributes.caption: Oct 28, 2016
attributes.description: According to reviews, Titanfall 2 is a pretty great game and improves on the original, which sold 10 million copies. Should be a recipe for success, right? Not according to analysts, who have slashed sales projections for the game because of reasons we've known about for months. Silly analysts.

attributes.title: Star Fox Zero: Is It Good?
attributes.caption: We'll tease you with a mighty "MAYBE."
attributes.description: We've finally got a new Star Fox, but is it what we wanted after all? We run down the biggest reviews to see what critical consensus is on the new space animal shooty game.
attributes.display_title: Star Fox Zero: Is It Good?

attributes.title: EA TAKES AWAY Purchased Games
attributes.caption: Oct 31, 2016
attributes.description: SPOoOoOKY! All the digital game skeptics have reason to celebrate today, since EA has shown just why digital games can be a problem--even if you've purchased them, they can be taken away without warning. And that's exactly what's happened to Origin users in several countries.

attributes.title: eSports Cheaters Arrested
attributes.description: It's like a real sport, on account of the match fixing and illegal gambling! A bunch of Starcraft 2 players have been arrested (again) for fixing matches, and one of the money men is still on the lam. Get him, boys!

attributes.title: Call of Duty Infinite Warfare PAY TO WIN!?
attributes.caption: "Ooooooooh... spookies!"
attributes.description: The most feared, most terrible insult now applied to the worst game franchise of all time. The worst has happened, my friends. Video games are ruined forever.
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty Infinite Warfare PAY TO WIN!?

attributes.title: Division Glitch FAKED, Internet TROLLED? - The Know
attributes.description: We may not have been fast enough to report on the original story, but we're sure as shit ready to swim in its wake and pretend to be smarter than everyone else.
attributes.display_title: Division Glitch FAKED, Internet TROLLED? - The Know

attributes.title: Skyrim: Special Edition BEST Console Mods
attributes.caption: Oct 31, 2016
attributes.description: Skyrim Special Edition is here and so are console mods for the game. Here are some you should definitely be picking up.
attributes.display_title: Skyrim: Special Edition BEST Console Mods

attributes.title: eSports BANS Porn
attributes.description: Pornography? In my eSports? Well not anymore. The YouPorn sponsored eSports team has been banned from participating in competitions organized by the Electronic Sports League.

attributes.title: Nintendo NX Release Date REVEALED
attributes.description: The release date for Nintendo's next console has been announced, as well as details about the big N's plans for E3 this year and the next installment in the Zelda series.

attributes.title: Mass Effect Andromeda NEW DETAILS
attributes.caption: Nov 1, 2016
attributes.description: Why do we have Mass Effect: Andromeda news? It's not N7 day. This is suspicious. But there's a teaser here and it has new details. Let's just be happy about that.

attributes.title: Nintendo NX STREAMING, SUBSCRIPTION-Based? - The Know
attributes.description: We offer pure speculation on what the NX might be based on market analysis. That's a lot of big words to say that we think it'll be a streaming box with all the Marios you can handle. Check out our reasoning or just tell us we're stupid in the comments!  SOURCES:  Previous NX Report:   Written By: Lawrence Sonntag  Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag

attributes.title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare LEAKS
attributes.description: Infinite Call of Duty games? That's debatable, but the next COD game is slated to be titled Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare. News of a remaster of COD 4: Modern Warfare has also leaked.
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare LEAKS

attributes.title: Battlefront 2 DETAILS Confirmed! + Titanfall 2 Not EA's Fault, They Swear
attributes.caption: Nov 2, 2016
attributes.description: EA dropped some bombs on an investor call, including details for time and content on Star Wars: Battlefront 2. Plus, Titanfall 2 sales definitely aren't because they launched it in between the two biggest FPS titles of the year. Oh, and they're happy to delay Mass Effect because of all that money they have. INVESTORS!
attributes.display_title: Battlefront 2 DETAILS Confirmed! + Titanfall 2 Not EA's Fault, They Swear

attributes.title: PSN Bigger Than ALL of Nintendo
attributes.description: Release the sales numbers! The financial reports for Sony, Microsoft, and Nintendo are in, and they're full of shocking data that's really not all that shocking (hint: PS4 and PSN is kicking lots of ass).
attributes.display_title: PSN Bigger Than ALL of Nintendo

attributes.title: Facebook Announces Steam Competitor
attributes.caption: Play Candy Crush with your racist aunt!
attributes.description: Facebook decided it was too easy, too simple to play video games. Welcome to the OOM ZOOM.

attributes.title: Battlefield 5: What We Want! - The Know
