attributes.title: Best Games for PS4 Pro
attributes.caption: Nov 4, 2016
attributes.description: PS4 Pro will launch with 30 games optimized for the system. But not all optimizations are optimized optimally. Here's what you can expect for those to get the most out of your hamburger console.

attributes.title: Rockstar Making BIBLE Game?
attributes.description: Yes, you read that title correctly, a Biblical Rockstar game could be a thing that exists. Records have surfaced showing Rockstar has filed a trademark for the word "Judas" leading to some speculation that Grand Theft Bethlehem may one day be a reality. Just imagine the other 11 disciples DLC.

attributes.title: Ubisoft Killing Off Singleplayer Games?
attributes.caption: Nov 4, 2016
attributes.description: Ubisoft wants your microtransaction dollars. That's why they're going to focus on multiplayer games instead of singleplayer ones. What could go wrong?

attributes.title: Modern Warfare Remastered, New Call of Duty Announced! - The Know
attributes.description: New year, new Call of Duty. But no, guys, you don't understand. THIS is the bad one. THIS is where it'll all change. What do you mean you're buying it? Well I guess I'll buy it too.
attributes.display_title: Modern Warfare Remastered, New Call of Duty Announced! - The Know

attributes.title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare... Does It SUCK?
attributes.caption: Nov 4, 2016
attributes.description: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare is out and it's time to see if it deserves all the hate it's been getting from anti-fans since its first reveal trailer. We'll take a look at critical reviews, user reviews, and weigh in to answer the most important question in all the world... DOES IT SUCK?
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare... Does It SUCK?

attributes.title: Battlefield Devs SLAM Call of Duty
attributes.description: Battlefield and Call of Duty are duking it out! Not with bullets and explosions, but with snarky Twitter posts. COD released it's trailer for Infinite Warfare ahead of Battlefield 5's reveal event this week and some developers from DICE decided to chime in with their opinions of it via Twitter. Now we all get to bask in the drama.
attributes.display_title: Battlefield Devs SLAM Call of Duty

attributes.title: Know Before You Go... Dishonored 2
attributes.caption: Nov 5, 2016
attributes.description: Dishonored 2 is out in less than a week. Check out our overview of the game's story, features, and the differences you can expect when playing either Corvo or Emily in the game.

attributes.title: World's First Video Game Superhero? - The Know
attributes.description: In a city lost to cheaters, where players can no longer rely on VAC for protection... ONE MAN rises from the ashes of crime and aimbots. He is... VACMAN.     Written By: Lawrence Sonntag     Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: World's First Video Game Superhero? - The Know

attributes.title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare ALREADY A FAILURE?
attributes.caption: Nov 7, 2016
attributes.description: Early sales figures are in for Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare, and it looks like the game's not doing so well. Of course, not doing so well for a Call of Duty game still means a bajillion copies, but take your wins where you can, haters.
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare ALREADY A FAILURE?

attributes.title: New Star Wars Game From Titanfall Devs
attributes.description: The developers behind Titanfall are making a Star Wars game? And it might be kind of like God of War? Count us in! Also, Jedi Master Jedi Master Jedi Master.
attributes.display_title: New Star Wars Game From Titanfall Devs

attributes.title: Mass Effect: Andromeda NEW N7 DAY DETAILS
attributes.caption: Nov 7, 2016
attributes.description: It's N7 Day, and that means BioWare's finally talking about Mass Effect Andromeda. They're not giving us everything we want, but we have plenty of new details to chew on. Game versions, betas, loyalty missions, backwards compatibility for the originals, pretty views of space.... hold on to your butts! We're going in.
attributes.display_title: Mass Effect: Andromeda NEW N7 DAY DETAILS

attributes.title: Uncharted 4: IS IT GOOD?
attributes.description: The review embargo for Uncharted 4 has lifted. You know what that means. Review round up time! Is the fourth game in the swashbuckling series something to treasure?

attributes.title: NX Uses Cartridges?
attributes.description: Nintendo could be saying sayonara to disc media, and bringing back cartridges for the NX? Maybe next they'll bring back Nintendo Power and that weird N64 controller. Either way, a cartridge switch may actually be a good move for the new console.

attributes.title: PlayStation Network HACKED (Again)?
attributes.caption: Nov 8, 2016
attributes.description: PSN users in the UK have noted a dramatic uptick in hacked accounts over the last few days, with the PSN UK Twitter account being inundated with requests for support. Reportedly, users are also suffering unauthorized wallet deposits from their Paypal accounts and, in some cases, unauthorized purchases of games... specifically, FIFA. Footy!

attributes.title: Battlefield 1 Revealed! CoD Dead? - The Know
attributes.description: Fourteen years of Battlefield games and they finally got around to making Battlefield 1. Come on lazy devs! What's next from these clowns, Battlefield 2?! How absurd.  SOURCES:  Battlefield Live Event Reveal:   Battlefield 1 Trailer:   Previous Speculative Battlefield Report:   Written By: Lawrence Sonntag  Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Omar de Armas, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: Battlefield 1 Revealed! CoD Dead? - The Know

attributes.title: Dishonored 2 BROKEN on PC?
attributes.caption: Nov 10, 2016
attributes.description: Dishonored 2 is arriving in the hands of those brave enough to pre-order a the game ahead of reviews, now that Bethesda's not providing early copies for critics and.... doff the tinfoil caps because you may be on to something. Early reports have the PC port of the game as being SUPER busted. AKA a Bethesda game.

attributes.title: Steam's Community SUCKS? - The Know
attributes.description: Bizarrely, the title isn't as clickbaity as the comments are probably accusing us of being. Steam's community does kind of suck, but it's kind of awesome too. Will fixing it also remove what makes it work?

attributes.title: Black Friday BEST GAMING DEALS
attributes.caption: Nov 10, 2016
attributes.description: What's better than spending all your money on gaming stuff? Spending less of your money to get more gaming stuff! Some of the Black Friday deals for games are pretty insane this year, so if you've been holding off on a new console or TV you could be in luck.

attributes.title: Will Battlefield 1 Be BROKEN?
attributes.description: The Battlefield 1 trailer has been released for only a few days and has already racked tens of millions of views, so people are obviously excited for the new WW1 shooter. But given the less than stellar track record EA and DICE have with launch issues, will Battlefield 1 be broken at launch? We also have some more leaked details about the game's single player campaign and achievements.

attributes.title: Pokemon Sun/Moon starters REVEALED
attributes.description: Hope you love fire cats, water dogs, and bow-tie owls, because you'll be spending a lot of time with them when Pokemon Sun & Moon hit this fall. But don't worry, there are probably tons of other weird animals in the game, too. Anyway, let's break down the trailer.

attributes.title: Battlefront 2 CONFIRMED
attributes.description: Battlefront 2 next year? A new Star Wars game every year for the next 3-4 years? We learned all that and more from crawling the transcript of an EA investors call yesterday, including brand new IPs coming from EA. You're welcome, internet.

attributes.title: More Games WORSE on PlayStation 4 Pro - The Know Game News
attributes.caption: Nov 11, 2016
attributes.description: Skyrim isn't the only game suffering on PS4 Pro. Comparisons are showing that several games with PS4 Pro optimization are actually performing worse on PS4 Pro than the vanilla hardware, even in the same modes. This too shall pass (eventually) but it's worth considering if you're up in the air about buying one right now.
attributes.display_title: More Games WORSE on PlayStation 4 Pro - The Know Game News

attributes.title: First Details on Kojima's Next Game? - The Know
attributes.caption: C'mon, Kojima. Give us something!
attributes.description: Kojima, your mind is too beautiful to not make video games. Let us attach onto it like some sort of parasitic leech and suck out all your delicious brain waves until you shrivel like a raisin.
attributes.display_title: First Details on Kojima's Next Game? - The Know

attributes.title: Overwatch: Biggest Beta EVER?
attributes.description: Overwatch's beta was all kinds of a big deal, and was basically Blizzard's biggest beta ever. How big? It beat out Battleborn, Gears of War 4, and even dominated adult video searches.

attributes.title: Watch Dogs 2: Is It Good? (And Is it Broken?)
attributes.caption: Nov 14, 2016
attributes.description: Reviews are here for Watch Dogs 2. Can it help the franchise recover from its underwhelming start? Looks like that's a yes, but... only the parts of the game that actually work.
attributes.display_title: Watch Dogs 2: Is It Good? (And Is it Broken?)

attributes.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Trilogy Leaked! BUT... - The Know
attributes.caption: Good news and bad news.
attributes.description: It looks like we ARE getting a Modern Warfare re-release, but not in the way we wanted. Activision, y u do dis.    Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Omar de Armas, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Trilogy Leaked! BUT... - The Know

attributes.title: Capcom Is Sorry About Street Fighter V
attributes.description: Street Fighter V hit Capcom right where it hurts, and now the company has decided it needs to spend more time finishing games before they come out. Apparently, gamers want finished products if they pay $60. Who knew?
attributes.display_title: Capcom Is Sorry About Street Fighter V

attributes.title: Nintendo NX LATEST RUMORS! - The Know
attributes.caption: Breaking down all the possibilities.
attributes.description: At this point, an IBM supercomputer could probably generate Nintendo NX rumor episodes on The Know.    Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, James Willems, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: Nintendo NX LATEST RUMORS! - The Know

attributes.title: Pokémon Sun & Moon WORTH BUYING?
attributes.caption: Nov 15, 2016
attributes.description: Pokemon Sun & Moon FINALLY comes out this week. Reviews are pouring in, we've had some time to play it ourselves. If you're trying to decide if it's worth your dollar, you may want to see this.

attributes.title: Uncharted 4 Review DRAMA
attributes.description: People are in such a huff about an Uncharted 4 review that they've created a petition asking it to be removed from Metacritic. Could this be Uncharted 4: A Metacritic's End?

attributes.title: Dead Rising 4 LIED?
attributes.caption: Nov 16, 2016
attributes.description: Dead Rising 4 is coming out soon but new details about how the game's co-op REALLY works have fans upset that it's not really Dead Rising at all anymore, and you'll have to buy DLC to get classic game modes.

attributes.title: E3 2016 Biggest EVER?
attributes.description: Everyone's worried about E3 no-shows, but it looks like we've got more press events than EVER. We break down everything we know about the gaming expo.

attributes.title: No Man's Sky Designer Moves on to Star Citizen
attributes.caption: Nov 16, 2016
attributes.description: A designer on No Man's Sky has jumped ship to work on Star Citizen's standalone game, Squadron 42. He does have plenty of experience with building space games. Not great ones, but... definitely space games. Fear, ye Star Citizen fans. And wonder if NMS will ever be fixed, ye angry space explorers.
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky Designer Moves on to Star Citizen

attributes.title: Reviewers Bad at Games?
attributes.description: If a video game critic sucks at Doom, does anybody see it? Well they did this time, and it started a big, weird discussion about whether or not video game reviewers need to be good at games.

attributes.title: Pokemon Sun & Moon Pirates BANNED FOREVER
attributes.caption: Nov 16, 2016
attributes.description: Pokemon Sun & Moon received an early release via pirates last week. Now, Nintendo is punching back and it's costing the pirates more than the price of a game.
attributes.display_title: Pokemon Sun & Moon Pirates BANNED FOREVER

attributes.title: Resident Evil 7 at E3? - The Know
attributes.caption: Damn you, Wesker!
attributes.description: We're about due for another one, but will this one be good? More importantly, will have Wesker? Even more importantly, will Wesker be wearing even more Neo coats?  Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: Resident Evil 7 at E3? - The Know

attributes.title: Hackers FOUND GUILTY of Stealing Millions from EA
attributes.caption: Nov 17, 2016
attributes.description: Earlier this week a hacker went on trial for cheating EA of millions of dollars in FIFA coins. Boy, did that trial go fast, because he's already been ruled GUILTY, and someone probably took away his lamborghini... kids these days.
attributes.display_title: Hackers FOUND GUILTY of Stealing Millions from EA

attributes.title: Nintendo Games on PC?
attributes.description: Nintendo announced some new business plans and corporate restructuring this week, some of which may indicate that we could be seeing Nintendo games on PC. Hopefully not in MOBA form.

attributes.title: EA's Declares New Rules for YouTubers
attributes.caption: Nov 17, 2016
attributes.description: EA's coming to lay down the law for people who stream or do Let's Plays in their games on YouTube and Twitch. Specifically, they want content creators to be more transparent when they're doing sponsored content, or when they get games free.
attributes.display_title: EA's Declares New Rules for YouTubers

attributes.title: Is Bioware Moving On From RPGs?
attributes.description: EA is hinting that Bioware has ditched RPGs for its new franchise, focusing instead on making action games. Bioware's been dabbling with this for years now, but is their transformation finally complete?
attributes.display_title: Is Bioware Moving On From RPGs?

attributes.title: Black Friday BEST PC and CONSOLE GAMING DEALS
attributes.caption: Nov 18, 2016
attributes.description: Looking for deals on PC gaming hardware? Games on the cheap? Consoles for a song? Here's a collection of all the latest and greatest Black Friday deals... some of which are actually available starting now!
attributes.display_title: Black Friday BEST PC and CONSOLE GAMING DEALS

attributes.title: Destiny Expansion LEAKED
attributes.description: Destiny's next expansion has leaked -- although maybe it was leaked on purpose, if the conspiracy theorists are to be believed. Anyway, we break down Rise of Iron information, and theorize where Destiny might be headed next.

attributes.title: The Witcher Done FOREVER? - The Know
attributes.caption: "What the $#@% is Gwent?"
attributes.description: That's a wrap on the age of Witcher. Will Witching ever be the same? Have we seen the Witchiest Witchers that will ever Witch? These questions and more, answered!
attributes.display_title: The Witcher Done FOREVER? - The Know

attributes.title: Pokemon Stars + Mario RPG for Nintendo Switch
attributes.caption: Nov 19 2016
attributes.description: A version of Pokemon Sun & Moon, codenamed Stars, on Nintendo Switch leaks have gained more momentum from new sources. Plus word of a Mario RPG crossover with Ubisoft's Rabbids.
attributes.display_title: Pokemon Stars + Mario RPG for Nintendo Switch

attributes.title: Nintendo Fan Games BANNED from The Game Awards?
attributes.caption: Nov 21, 2016
attributes.description: Two fan games, AM2R and Pokemon Uranium, have mysteriously gone missing from The Game Awards candidates for Best Fan Creation. Did Nintendo exert some pressure to get them booted?
attributes.display_title: Nintendo Fan Games BANNED from The Game Awards?

attributes.title: Did Uncharted 4 Outsell Uncharted 3? - The Know
attributes.caption: "Went to Vegas, went to a club, was confused, ate a hamburger, went to sleep"
attributes.description: Normally we like to answer the question we ask in the title but this one's extra tricky. Tune in for that mystery plus Adam's wild Vegas stories.  Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: Did Uncharted 4 Outsell Uncharted 3? - The Know

attributes.title: Watch Dogs 2 a HUGE FAILURE?
attributes.caption: Nov 21, 2016
attributes.description: It's been a bad holiday for sequels. Games that you think would be busy building their swimming pools of money but actually some of the biggest franchises of the year are... not doing so great. Everyone, welcome Watch Dogs 2 to that club.

attributes.title: Oculus DRM enables piracy
attributes.description: Oculus changed its mind about DRM, and things didn't go so hot. In fact, it might be easier to pirate their games than ever. Oops.

attributes.title: Final Fantasy XV Already SPOILED! Director Apologizes
attributes.caption: Nov 22, 2016
attributes.description: Final Fantasy XV may have been delayed with the goal of saving people from spoilers and avoiding a huge day 1 update but.... well, early leaks of the game thanks to international retailers have completely spoiled the ending and there's still a huge day 1 update.
attributes.display_title: Final Fantasy XV Already SPOILED! Director Apologizes

attributes.title: RIP Half-Life 10 Years
attributes.description: This week marks the tenth anniversary of the announcement of Half-Life 2: Episode 3. Let's take a look back at the long meme generating history of this title. Will we ever get another Half-Life game? Maybe you should ask the G-Man because Gabe Newell sure isn't talking.

attributes.title: PlayStation VR HACKED for Steam
attributes.caption: Nov 22, 2016
attributes.description: Hardware hackers are busy at work to make VR more affordable for pc users by hacking PlayStation VR to work with Steam games.

attributes.title: Should Overwatch Cost $40? - The Know
attributes.caption: Just buy it.
attributes.description: We're pretty sure everyone will say yes, since cheaper is better. As usual, it's not that simple.    Written By: Lawrence SonntagHosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag

attributes.title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare KILLING GameStop?
attributes.caption: Nov 23, 2016
attributes.description: What do you do when your retail sales for videogames are down? FIND A SCAPEGOAT! And what better scapegoat this year than the under performing Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare? It's like last year except they had to blame 3 games that time!
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare KILLING GameStop?

attributes.title: Know Before You Go... Final Fantasy XV
attributes.caption: Nov 26, 2016
attributes.description: Final Fantasy XV is almost here. It's been a long wait, but now it's time to broad trip. Curious what the game is all about? Here's a quick overview on everything you should know.
attributes.display_title: Know Before You Go... Final Fantasy XV

attributes.title: Overwatch Game Of The Year Decided?
attributes.description: You already love Overwatch, but now you know that reviewers love it too! The game's score already makes it a contender for GOTY status -- and maybe even more than that.
attributes.display_title: Overwatch Game Of The Year Decided?

attributes.title: No Man's Sky MAJOR UPDATE: It's GOOD Now!?
attributes.caption: Nov 28, 2016
attributes.description: Praise the Atlas or whatever. No Man's Sky has received its first major update, the Foundation update, and... well, it's buggy, but aside from that it actually adds a lot to the game. This occasion is momentous enough that even Sean Murray dusted off his Twitter to speak words again. Is it enough to make good for gamers or is it too late for that?
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky MAJOR UPDATE: It's GOOD Now!?

attributes.title: New Xbox 4 Times More Powerful Than Xbox One?
attributes.description: We've got a new Xbox coming in 2016, and another coming in 2017, if new reports are to be believed. And the second of these new boxes actually beats out the PS4 NEO in terms of power.
attributes.display_title: New Xbox 4 Times More Powerful Than Xbox One?

attributes.title: Final Fantasy XV: IS IT GOOD?
attributes.caption: Nov 28, 2016
attributes.description: Final Fantasy XV has been cooking for 10 years. After all that time, and all the different iterations its gone through along the way, is it as delicious a treat as promised or has time spoiled it? The reviews are in and we can finally answer the big question: IS IT GOOD?
attributes.display_title: Final Fantasy XV: IS IT GOOD?

attributes.title: PSVR "Awful" On Original PS4?
attributes.description: An industry insider has said some strong words about the original PS4's VR capabilities. Does this mean you need a PS4 Neo to handle VR?

attributes.title: Stardew Valley for Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, PS4
attributes.caption: Nov 29, 2016
attributes.description: If you listened to The Patch earlier this year you can't have escaped our obsession with Stardew Valley. Luckily, it's now going to be available to everyone because it's coming to Xbox One, PS4, and Nintendo Switch. Actually, Nintendo Switch's 3rd party support in general is sounding pretty rad.
attributes.display_title: Stardew Valley for Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, PS4

attributes.title: Death Threats Over No Man's Sky
attributes.description: If you're going to delay your game, you might as well not be alive any more, according to some rather "passionate" No Man's Sky fans. What's with giving game developers death threats?
attributes.display_title: Death Threats Over No Man's Sky

attributes.title: No Man's Sky DIDN'T LIE?
attributes.caption: Nov 30, 2016
attributes.description: The ASA, a UK consumer watchdog agency, has been investigating No Man's Sky over complaints lodged from buyers that the advertising for the game on Steam was misleading. Now they've issued their verdict.

attributes.title: Ubisoft Hostile Takeover Imminent?
attributes.description: Ubisoft's founders have been trying to fend off a hostile takeover for months now -- and things aren't looking so good. Could one of the biggest videogame publishers in the world soon be under new management?

attributes.title: Xbox Price Drop! New Xbox THIS MONTH? - The Know
attributes.caption: "This is not a movie, it's a T.V. show, and it's not even that."
attributes.description: We're through the looking glass, people... except this glass costs $300 to look through.    Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: Xbox Price Drop! New Xbox THIS MONTH? - The Know

attributes.title: NX Delayed For VR?
attributes.description: Well, Nintendo, if you won't talk about the NX, we WILL. More new rumors and leaks are circulating. This time, apparent confirmation that the NX will include a handheld after all, and apparently the whole thing was pushed back because Nintendo heard about this new thing called VR and figured they should add it. What could go wrong?

attributes.title: Konami IMPRISONED Kojima + Game Awards 2016 Recap!
attributes.description: The Konami hate train is running fast and furious after last night's Game Awards. Following the event, host Geoff Keighley revealed that Konami's treatment of Kojima was way worse than we ever thought. Plus, we've got news on Mass Effect Andromeda, the new Legend of Zelda, and more!
attributes.display_title: Konami IMPRISONED Kojima + Game Awards 2016 Recap!

attributes.title: GTA Online Going Away?
attributes.description: Is GTA Online going, offline? According to the CEO of GTA's publisher it is, so that they can "rest the franchise". Will this be a signal that GTA 6 is in development? What is going to happen to our virtual real estate and vehicles, will no one think of the let's plays?

attributes.title: Bethesda GETS LEGAL on Fanmade Content
attributes.description: We all though Bethesda was the chosen one, but it looks like even they've got a case of the cease and desist order bug. Despite the company being super mod friendly, it looks like one Doom fan might have stepped a little too far by trying to Kickstart a game based on a fan project he made 14 years ago.
attributes.display_title: Bethesda GETS LEGAL on Fanmade Content

attributes.title: Overwatch Players Banned FOREVER?
attributes.description: Apparently when Blizzard says banned they mean it, as some cheaters are finding out the hard way. Players that have used cheating tools in Overwatch are reporting getting banned repeatedly even after buying new copies of the game, changing IP addresses and using VPNs. No respawn timer for you cheaters.

attributes.title: Know Before You Go...The Last Guardian
attributes.description: PlayStation owners have been waiting a long time for The Last Guardian. Will it pick up Team Ico's legacy? What exactly is up with the cat eagle thing? Here's a quick overview on everything you should know.
attributes.display_title: Know Before You Go...The Last Guardian

attributes.title: Metal Gear Pachinko: Most Hated on YouTube?
attributes.description: Metal Gear pachinko has been the butt of a long-running internet joke, but now it's REAL. And guess what, it's already going down in internet infamy. Let's find out just how much people hate it.
attributes.display_title: Metal Gear Pachinko: Most Hated on YouTube?

attributes.title: The Last of Us PART 2 REVEALED! More Uncharted! PSX Roundup
attributes.caption: Dec 5, 2016
attributes.description: PlayStation Experience 2016 is over! We got some not so big news, like Knack 2. But then there was some pretty rad stuff like The Last of Us Part 2, more Uncharted because A Thief's End wasn't THE END after all, Crash Bandicoot, and more. Let's be real though. The Last of Us 2, right?
attributes.display_title: The Last of Us PART 2 REVEALED! More Uncharted! PSX Roundup

attributes.title: Infinite Warfare Failed ALREADY?
attributes.description: Trailer dislikes may have actually turned into bad sales for Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare. According to reports, the game's pre-orders are WAY under what they were at this time last year.This episode sponsored by Loot Anime.

attributes.title: Dead Rising 4: Is It GOOD?
attributes.caption: Dec 5, 2016
attributes.description: Dead Rising 4 is here with a festive new entry in the series that sees the return of Frank West and his camera. A lot has changed--difficulty, time limits, voice actors... so it's a good thing reviews are hitting to help you determine... Is It GOOD?

attributes.title: Star Wars Battlefront 3 Remake SAVED? - The Know
attributes.caption: "Meesa thinkin' meesa wanna play Naboo!"
attributes.description: The lord above is merciful because Galaxy in Turmoil looks pretty damn good. Let's hope the overlords at Lucasfilm don't catch wind of it.
attributes.display_title: Star Wars Battlefront 3 Remake SAVED? - The Know

attributes.title: The Last Guardian: Is It Good?
attributes.caption: Dec 5, 2016
attributes.description: The Last Guardian is finally hitting shelves! Did the long development time hurt it in any way? Is cat bird dog as cute as it seems? Has Team ICO got their act together when it comes to cameras and controls? The reviews are ready to break all that down for you.
attributes.display_title: The Last Guardian: Is It Good?

attributes.title: Dead Rising 4 Leaks?
attributes.description: Leaked screenshots and multiple sources have confirmed that Dead Rising 4 is real and may be an exclusive for Xbox One. Will we be seeing it at Microsoft's E3 press event next week?

attributes.title: Russian Officials Accuse FIFA 17 Video Game of ‘Gay Propaganda’
attributes.caption: Dec 6, 2016
attributes.description: Forget BioWare's games, The Sims, and Skyrim. Russia's got a problem with FIFA 17 promoting LGBT tolerance as "gay propaganda." Strap in, it's time to get Tetris on this issue.
attributes.display_title: Russian Officials Accuse FIFA 17 Video Game of ‘Gay Propaganda’

attributes.title: Bethesda's E3 Plans REVEALED: Skyrim Remastered
attributes.description: Bethesda's going to be announcing a remastered Skyrim at E3? That's what the rumor says, and some other press outlets have corroborated the information. We've also got reports about all the rest of Bethesda's announcements.
attributes.display_title: Bethesda's E3 Plans REVEALED: Skyrim Remastered

attributes.title: New Law Against Video Game Hacks
attributes.caption: Dec 6, 2016
attributes.description: A new law in South Korea could clean up competitive games by hitting the authors of these hacks with serious fines and even jail time.
attributes.display_title: New Law Against Video Game Hacks

attributes.title: Fallout 4 Stolen Mods Need Legal Action?
attributes.description: It's a war of console versus PC gamers in the Fallout 4 modding community! Modders are accusing one another of stealing content, leading to some pretty huge...fallout...
attributes.display_title: Fallout 4 Stolen Mods Need Legal Action?

attributes.title: Dark Souls + GameCube Games on Nintendo Switch Leaks!
attributes.caption: Dec 7, 2016
attributes.description: We're still a month away from hands on and Nintendo really spilling the beans on Nintendo Switch, but that won't stop this boat from leaking. Now it looks like From Software wants to bring the Dark Souls trilogy to the platform (if it sells better than Wii U, anyway) and we may see iconic GameCube games available on the system too.
attributes.display_title: Dark Souls + GameCube Games on Nintendo Switch Leaks!

attributes.title: Everything You'll See At E3
attributes.description: E3's just around the corner! Here's everything you need to know about the event, including all the confirmed big games, and what you should expect from each publisher.

attributes.title: Pokemon Go WANTS YOU (back... please?)
attributes.caption: Dec 7, 2016
attributes.description: Sure, Pokemon Go fell on its face because it suffered from TOO MUCH SUCCESS when it came out, but most people have moved on, and Niantic wants you back! In addition with partnering with Starbucks to blend up all those pokemon you trade away for candy, they're gearing up to launch 100 new pokemon. Oh, you wanted battles and trading? Silly you.

attributes.title: Watch Dogs 2 REVEALED! - The Know
attributes.caption: Lawrence is the NEW watchdog.
attributes.description: Now with double the hacks! That's right, two hacks for two hands; that's four hacks! Don't buy discount games that only give you one hack. Watch Dogs 2: The Game With Eighteen Hacks Per Hack.    GameSpot Reveal Stream:     Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag

attributes.title: Destiny Rise Of Iron Leaks; ABANDONS Last Gen?
attributes.description: Destiny's expansion leaked AGAIN? We've got all the Rise of Iron details early, plus some info that last generation guardians might not be too happy about.
attributes.display_title: Destiny Rise Of Iron Leaks; ABANDONS Last Gen?

attributes.title: Star Wars BATTLEFRONT 2 Fixes Everything?
attributes.caption: Dec 8, 2016
attributes.description: Star Wars Battlefront 2 won't be out until next year, but that hasn't stopped EA from talking it up to their investors. Now we've got details on how it aims to fix all the things that were missing from Battlefront: air to land battles, an actual campaign, and more.

attributes.title: E3: Who's Full of HOT AIR?
attributes.description: Things don't always go as planned after E3. A new study shows that the majority of games we see at E3 don't come out for a looooong time. In fact, the numbers are even worse than you think.
attributes.display_title: E3: Who's Full of HOT AIR?

attributes.title: PlayStation Will SAVE Sony Movies?
attributes.caption: Dec 12, 2016
attributes.description: PlayStation has been Sony's big money maker for a while. The company may lean on it even more heavily now by moving its movie productions under that business umbrella to offset losses from its films.

attributes.title: Windows Store Is a "Disaster"
attributes.description: Windows Store is a "disaster?" That's what one source close to Microsoft says, dishing out a number of troubling comments about Microsoft's cross-platform play ambitions.

attributes.title: Crytek OUT OF MONEY (Again? Still?)
attributes.caption: Dec 12, 2016
attributes.description: It looks like Crytek has stopped paying their developers. Again. For the last six months or so. It's not the first time the Crysis developer has been in hot water over wages, but it's looking increasingly difficult to pull itself out of this one.

attributes.title: Sony CONFIRMS PS4 Neo Details!
attributes.description: Oh snap! Sony has just confirmed that the PS4K -- or NEO -- is real! However, we may have to wait just a little bit before we see it...

attributes.title: Miyamoto: Video Games AREN'T ART?
attributes.caption: Dec 13, 2016
attributes.description: Are video games art? Depends on who you ask, but industry legend Shigeru Miyamoto he will tell you his games aren't. They're products.

attributes.title: Battlefield 1 Microtransactions CONFIRMED
attributes.description: Battlefield 1's setting might not be the only thing stuck in the past. According to EA's CEO, the game is still going to have paid map packs and a variety of other microtransactions.

attributes.title: 'Just Stop Playing,' Rust Developer Advises
attributes.caption: Dec 14, 2016
attributes.description: If you're a developer of an early access game and your players are constantly wanting updates to the game do you, A) keep working on the content since it IS early access, after all, or B) tell your fans to stop playing the game? We're going to go with option B.

attributes.title: QUAKE, NEW STAR WARS, MASS EFFECT: E3 Sunday Conference Recap
attributes.description: The first 2 press conferences of this years E3 are over and done with. But no worries if you missed anything because we have a recap for you of what EA and Bethesda announced on stage.
attributes.display_title: QUAKE, NEW STAR WARS, MASS EFFECT: E3 Sunday Conference Recap

attributes.title: Nintendo Switch UNDERPOWERED?
attributes.caption: Dec 15, 2016
attributes.description: There have been all kinds of conflicting rumors and leaks about just how powerful the hardware will be for Nintendo Switch. But based on some new information, the console may be coming in surprisingly... underpowered. Let's take a look and figure out how important that power might be for Nintendo's new console and the new VR-related patents Nintendo's been filing.

attributes.title: NEW XBOX, RESIDENT EVIL 7, GOD OF WAR 4, KOJIMA: E3 Monday Conference Recap
attributes.description: The E3 hype train keeps moving full steam ahead. Did you miss anything from the Microsoft Ubisoft or Sony announcements? We've got you covered with a recap of the biggest announcements from each event.
attributes.display_title: NEW XBOX, RESIDENT EVIL 7, GOD OF WAR 4, KOJIMA: E3 Monday Conference Recap

attributes.title: Kojima Recruits Top Konami Exec!
attributes.caption: Dec 16, 2016
attributes.description: Kojima's done with Konami. He's going to start his own Konami, with Blackjack. and Hookers. And call it Imanok... or Kojima Productions. Whatever. The point is, he's scored more talent from the pachinko company formerly known as a game developer. And this one is one of their longtime top brass.

attributes.title: Valve and Oculus Go to War Over VR Exclusives
attributes.description: Valve and Oculus are putting on fighting gloves over VR exclusives! In the midst of some controversy over Oculus games, Gabe Newell may have a new strategy when it comes to making VR an open platform.
attributes.display_title: Valve and Oculus Go to War Over VR Exclusives

attributes.title: Pokemon OUTSELLS Call of Duty
attributes.caption: Dec 16, 2016
attributes.description: Call of Duty is having a rough year. Everyone thinks World War 1 is cooler than space, or that mech make for good besties. Now the biggest game franchise in the world that isn't GTA is having trouble competing against adorable new island colors of old Pokemon on a handheld console...

attributes.title: No Man's Sky No Mans Sky Secret Lawsuit
attributes.description: No Man's Sky is basically cursed at this point -- and now, it turns out the game was even being sued over using the word "Sky" in its name! What's this world coming to?
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky No Mans Sky Secret Lawsuit

attributes.title: Super Mario Run BIGGER Than Pokemon Go! (for now)
attributes.caption: Dec 19, 2016
attributes.description: Good news for those hoping Nintendo's foray into mobile gaming does well: so far Mario Run is doing even better than Pokemon Go! ...For now. Numbers may be huge, but investors are skeptical they'll stay that way, and for good reason. We break down Nintendo's baffling drop in stock price on the heels of this success.
attributes.display_title: Super Mario Run BIGGER Than Pokemon Go! (for now)

attributes.title: New PS4 Controller Leaked? - The Know
attributes.caption: "There's the highs of the highs and the lows of the lows."
attributes.description: Are you all burned out on awesome game announcements and trailers? Well come on down to The Know where we ground you a bit with talk of controllers that may or may not exist. EXCITING.
attributes.display_title: New PS4 Controller Leaked? - The Know

attributes.title: Analyst Claims Microsoft Will Quit Games Business
attributes.description: Will Microsoft exit the video game marketplace? That's what market research firm DFC Intelligence has said in a recent report citing the Xbox One's sales falling behind the PS4 and Xbox Scorpio not releasing until the end 2017. Could it be the end of Xbox?
attributes.display_title: Analyst Claims Microsoft Will Quit Games Business

attributes.title: Crytek SHUTS DOWN Studios
attributes.caption: Dec 20, 2016
attributes.description: Remember last week we reported on all those Crytek employees who weren't being paid? Now Crytek is shuttering five studios entirely, right before the holidays... not that they'd been paying their devs anyway...

attributes.title: Paragon Developer SUES Cheater
attributes.description: What's a game developer to do when hackers are selling cheats for your game? Easy, just sue them. That's exactly what Epic Games did to a german hacker selling cheating tools for their game Paragon. It's just like getting banned in real life, just with more lawyers.

attributes.title: Overwatch TOO GAY (for Russia)?
attributes.caption: Dec 21, 2016
attributes.description: If you're on the internet you've probably already heard Tracer's got a girlfriend... unless you're on Russia, where the comic revealing it isn't being released because of Russia's gay propaganda laws.

attributes.title: Overwatch Teen Makes Pros QUIT in Shame
attributes.description: If you're a Zarya lover, you should check out the story of one teenage girl who rocked a tournament so hard she made pro Overwatch players quit forever. That's a whole new level of rage quitting.
attributes.display_title: Overwatch Teen Makes Pros QUIT in Shame

attributes.title: Resident Evil 7 LEAKS
attributes.caption: Dec 21, 2016
attributes.description: Resident Evil 7 hits next month, and a demo just released on PC... so of course PC sleuths cracked the thing open and data mined it for all its worth. So... get ready for leaks invading the internet. If you want to steer clear of the details, you've been warned. If you want in on them, please step this way. We can tell you what you're in for.

attributes.title: G2A Scams Indie Developers? - The Know
attributes.description: G2A has published a response to tinyBuild's blog postWe're back with some spicy conflict for you guys. Choose your side: cheap games or struggling developers!Riot Games Restricts G2A Sponsorships:Written By: Lawrence SonntagHosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: G2A Scams Indie Developers? - The Know

attributes.title: PC vs PS4 vs Xbox One vs Wii U: Best Gaming Platform of 2016 by the Numbers
attributes.caption: Dec 22, 2016
attributes.description: When you break down all the reviews across all the games on all the platforms in 2016, there are winners and there are losers. Which platform had the best games lineup? Which games came out on top? Let's break it all down and see how this year stacks up against last year.
attributes.display_title: PC vs PS4 vs Xbox One vs Wii U: Best Gaming Platform of 2016 by the Numbers

attributes.title: PlayStation Owes Gamers $550 Million
attributes.description: Sony's handing out free money to former PS3 owners -- well, sorta. They just settled a huge lawsuit and now owe gamers a lot of money. You're going to have to jump through a few hoops for it.

attributes.title: Best Holiday Game Sale Deals
attributes.caption: Dec 23, 2016
attributes.description: Even if you don't get a sweet Christmas bonus, you've probably got some gifts coming that are money shaped. That's just trouble waiting to happen, so here are some really efficient ways to get rid of all that dough.

attributes.title: Star Citizen Kills Refunds?
attributes.description: Delays? What delays? Star Citizen recently updated its terms of service in a way that makes it pretty difficult to get a refund if you're unhappy about the game's progress.

attributes.title: Valve SUED Over CSGO Gambling
attributes.description: Counter-Strike has a gambling problem, according to a brand new lawsuit... from a guy who lost money gambling on CSGO skins. Yeah, it's pretty confusing.

attributes.title: Battlefield 1: SEXIST or NOT?
attributes.description: No women in Battlefield 1's multiplayer means we've got a good old fashioned internet controversy on our hands. Take a seat and enjoy your daily dose of drama.

attributes.title: PewDiePie HATES YouTube Clickbait? - The Know
attributes.caption: "Boom. Gotcha."
attributes.description: Get 'em, Pewds! We'll be your hype men, shouting over your shoulder while you drop hot fire all over YouTube. Only to make this analogous to YouTube clout we'd be like two and a half blocks away.  You can hear us when the bus isn't driving by...  SOURCES:  YOU WONT [sic] BELIEVE THIS CLICKBAIT:   Written By: Lawrence Sonntag  Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: PewDiePie HATES YouTube Clickbait? - The Know

attributes.title: Activision DMCAs an ENTIRE GAME on Steam
attributes.description: Activision's hit up an indie developer with a DMCA takedown that got their game removed from Steam. And you won't believe what happened next... no, seriously, you won't. It gets really crazy.
attributes.display_title: Activision DMCAs an ENTIRE GAME on Steam

attributes.title: Infinite Warfare Successful BECAUSE of Hate?
attributes.description: What's Activision got planned after all the negative reactions to Infinite Warfare? Not a damn thing, apparently. Suck it haters!
attributes.display_title: Infinite Warfare Successful BECAUSE of Hate?

attributes.title: Fallout 4 Console Mods In Trouble
attributes.description: Between the newly delayed PS4 mods and the in-fighting happening over Xbox One mods, Fallout 4's got a mod problem on their hands. Can they get things sorted in time for Skyrim's remastered edition?

attributes.title: YouTubers Caught In CSGO Gambling Scandal
attributes.description: YouTuber, Syndicate and Tmartn, have been implicated in a serious FTC violation over Counter-Strike: Global Offensive gambling and could face felony charges and jail time.
attributes.display_title: YouTubers Caught In CSGO Gambling Scandal

attributes.title: Call of Duty: Roman Wars?!
attributes.description: If you think Battlefield 1 is going old school, Call of Duty almost went even MORE old school. Back in 2008, we very nearly got the Gladiator twist nobody knew they wanted, Call of Duty: Roman Wars.

attributes.title: Microsoft Doing EVERYTHING You Want? - The Know
attributes.caption: "No, I hate them, they're corporations!"
attributes.description: Microsoft paid us ten MILLION dollars to record this episode because that totally happens. Now we're rich and we'll retire on a pile of Xboxes. Have fun being poor and normal, viewer.
attributes.display_title: Microsoft Doing EVERYTHING You Want? - The Know

attributes.title: Pokemon GO Is DANGEROUS?
attributes.description: Pokemon GO has only been out for 24 hours, and people are already using it with a major death wish. Is augmented reality the beginning of the end?

attributes.title: Microsoft Walks Back Play Anywhere?
attributes.description: Just a few days, and Microsoft's already changing its mind about Play Anywhere. We see your sneaky edit, Microsoft.

attributes.title: Boring Steam Sales Are Better?
attributes.description: Apparently, the more boring the Steam sale is, the more gamers love to spend money on it. Who knew?

attributes.title: New Battletoads LEAKED? No. - The Know
attributes.caption: Totally cool and rad-awesome!
attributes.description: Battletoads spun off a half-hour animated television special produced by Canadian DIC Entertainment, that aired in syndication in the United States on the weekend of Thanksgiving 1992 in an attempt to capitalize on the popularity of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (DiC would try this again later on by producing Street Sharks and then later Extreme Dinosaurs). However, only the pilot episode made it to the airwaves; it was never picked up as a full animated series, despite comic-style ads in GamePro magazine claiming otherwise. A VHS tape with the pilot was released in the United States on January 15, 1994.    Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: New Battletoads LEAKED? No. - The Know

attributes.title: Pokemon GO Bigger Than TWITTER; Trades Coming Soon
attributes.description: It's official: people like catching Pikachu more than they like chasing tail. Pokemon GO is already bigger than Tinder and is on its way to beating Twitter. What is this world coming to?
attributes.display_title: Pokemon GO Bigger Than TWITTER; Trades Coming Soon

attributes.title: WB And Youtubers Settle With The FTC
attributes.description: YouTubers taking money to promote a video game is nothing new, but it's not every day that a developer tells them not to disclose it. The FTC just announced a settlement with Warner Bros. over shady promotions for Shadow of Mordor.
attributes.display_title: WB And Youtubers Settle With The FTC

attributes.title: Pokemon GO Bigger than PORN?!
attributes.description: Pokemon GO's ridiculous rise continues -- it's now not only bigger than porn, it might be the biggest mobile game in US history. Will the madness ever stop?

attributes.title: Vulkan SAVES PC Gaming? - The Know
attributes.caption: "A little digital Mr. Belvedere."
attributes.description: Increased performance is all well and good, but what about marketing? May we propose a new prime time cop drama starring Detective Vulkan. He's a hard beat cop that earns a meager living improving the frame rates of out-of-work PC gamers in 30s era Chicago.
attributes.display_title: Vulkan SAVES PC Gaming? - The Know

attributes.title: Death Stranding: Kojima's Best Game EVER?
attributes.description: Death Stranding has barely even started in development, but Kojima already says it's probably going to be his best game yet, thanks to not having as many constraints. Is he taking shots at Konami?
attributes.display_title: Death Stranding: Kojima's Best Game EVER?

attributes.title: Bethesda Accused of Stealing Fan's Mod
attributes.description: A modder is accusing Bethesda of stealing his mod for use in Fallout 4's Far Harbor DLC. Is this a case of inspiration or theft?
attributes.display_title: Bethesda Accused of Stealing Fan's Mod

attributes.title: Adult Game Patreon STOLE Money & Cancelled?
attributes.description: OK, we've got some crazy stuff going on here. First, an adult farm simulator was the highest earning game on Patreon, apparently. And second, it just got cancelled and all the money's gone.
attributes.display_title: Adult Game Patreon STOLE Money & Cancelled?

attributes.title: Xbox One S & PS4 Neo Prices & Release Dates
attributes.description: We've got the release date of the Xbox One S and a potentially leaked release date and price of the PS4 Neo! Which new console will be the cat's meow?
attributes.display_title: Xbox One S & PS4 Neo Prices & Release Dates

attributes.title: Twitch Censoring Sex? - The Know
attributes.caption: "If Lawrence writes it, I believe it."
attributes.description: I don't want to live in a world where I can't blow kisses to a hot cop. It's not GAY, it's just...     OK it's super gay.    Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag

attributes.title: CS:GO Gambling RIGGED; Exposed by Hacker
attributes.description: Another week, another CSGO gambling scandal. However, this time it seems the streamer in question was actually rigging the bets while live on stream. Yikes.
attributes.display_title: CS:GO Gambling RIGGED; Exposed by Hacker

attributes.title: Indie Dev SCAMMED By Steam Keys - The Know
attributes.description: People scammed an indie dev who tried to offer gamers a chance to purchase their game directly. But that's pretty commonplace on the internet now, right? This is why we can't have nice things.
attributes.display_title: Indie Dev SCAMMED By Steam Keys - The Know

attributes.title: No Man's Sky PATENT TROLLED?
attributes.description: Floods and Trademarks and Patents oh my! No Man's Sky just can't seem to catch a break. The release is in less than a month but a Dutch company is claiming that Hello Games used its patented math formula to make the game's procedurally generated worlds.

attributes.title: Xbox Sales Slump? - The Know
attributes.description: That's a funny word. Slump. Slump. Slump.   Slummmmmp.  And now it doesn't mean anything. Slump.  Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, James Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag

attributes.title: Valve SHUTS DOWN CS:GO Gambling
attributes.description: Valve has unleashed the banhammer of justice on CSGO gambling, cracking down on gambling sites for good. Does this kill CSGO's esports hopes?

attributes.title: Man Arrested for Sending Death Threats to Blizzard
attributes.description: Sounds like somebody's unhappy with all the changes to Overwatch recently. One gamer is so peeved at Blizzard that he sent the company death threats. Fortunately, he's been arrested.
attributes.display_title: Man Arrested for Sending Death Threats to Blizzard

attributes.title: Nintendo: TOO MUCH Hype for Pokemon GO?
attributes.description: Whoa, everybody. Nintendo wants you to calm the heck down about Pokemon GO. In fact, they didn't really have all that much to do with it.
attributes.display_title: Nintendo: TOO MUCH Hype for Pokemon GO?

attributes.title: Xbox One Price Cut AGAIN?
attributes.description: The Xbox One is getting ANOTHER discount? We take a look at previous console generations, and whether or not the Xbox's downward price says anything about the future of the console.

attributes.title: Pokémon GO PEAKED? - The Know
attributes.caption: "I don't gotta catch any of 'em. You're not the boss of me.
attributes.description: Lord Pok__„Х_____„Х___б__„Х______„Х______„Х_____‰ЫЎ__е©mon has ruled these lands for too long. Rise, my brothers, and take back what's yours! Take back your slothful Sundays! Take back your hermetic lifestyles! Take back your declining cardiovascular systems!    Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag

attributes.title: Nintendo NX is a HANDHELD?
attributes.description: The NX has been rumored to be everything from a portable console to a hot dog warmer. For the first time, we may have the most credible report about Nintendo's new console yet, plus the hardware that makes it tick.

attributes.title: Marvel PC Remasters SUCK?
attributes.description: Guess what, PC gamers! You've got another shoddy comic book video game port. A couple of them, actually. Who's surprised? Are you surprised? You shouldn't be.

attributes.title: Nintendo Reports Huge Quarterly Loss
attributes.description: Nintendo lost a crapton of money over the last few months. Like an even bigger crapton than they normally do. Guess that's why they wanted everyone to know they didn't make Pokemon GO, huh?

attributes.title: Publisher FORGOT to Release Game
attributes.description: Everybody forgets things. Sometimes we forget to do our homework, or we forget to eat our veggies. And sometimes, you forget to publish the video game you're responsible for releasing on its actual release date. Sometimes that happens to people.

attributes.title: PlayStation VR Needs HOW MUCH Space?!
attributes.description: Hopefully you've got a sprawling detached converted garage to play your new PlayStation VR. According to a new brochure, it might need way more space to operate than people first thought.
attributes.display_title: PlayStation VR Needs HOW MUCH Space?!

attributes.title: Pokemon Go BROKEN, Users Want Refunds
attributes.description: We already knew Pokemon GO had peaked, but now it could be tanking. Some new updates and shutdowns over the weekend have tons of fans pissed off and asking for their microtransaction money back.
attributes.display_title: Pokemon Go BROKEN, Users Want Refunds

attributes.title: EA Kills Battlefront Fan Project
attributes.description: EA just blasted the unofficial Battlefront III remake, Galaxy in Turmoil, right out of the sky. The game's developer claims the game should be protected under fair use as a parody, but it seems Electronic Arts and LucasFilm disagree.

attributes.title: No Man's Sky LEAKS! - The Know
attributes.caption: Brace yourselves, spacefarers!
attributes.description: Is No Man's Sky our video game Jesus or actual Jesus? Is the game the literal third coming of our lord and savior Jesus Christ? The answer to all your questions lie inside.    Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky LEAKS! - The Know

attributes.title: Insane $90 Day 1 DLC on a Full Retail Game
attributes.description: Everybody gets their panties in a twist over day 1 DLC, but this day 1 DLC costs way more than most... and might actually involve real panties. It's weird.
attributes.display_title: Insane $90 Day 1 DLC on a Full Retail Game

attributes.title: Batman: The Telltale Series BROKEN
attributes.description: Another PC port is totally busted at launch? At this point we shouldn't be surprised, but developers keep outdoing themselves. The latest in the long list of broken PC ports comes from Batman: The Telltale Series.

attributes.title: Pokémon GO Sued?! - The Know
attributes.caption: Pokemon Stop?      Nailed it.
attributes.description: Is the Pokemon party over? Yes, provided you're looking exclusively for negative headlines. Everyone else is still playing and spending money it seems.    Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag

attributes.title: Nintendo NX Will Launch with POKEMON?!
attributes.description: We've got more potential information about the NX, including some HUGE launch window titles and an indication of what the price might be. Here's a hint about that launch title: it starts with a P and ends with OKEMON. You're probably stumped.
attributes.display_title: Nintendo NX Will Launch with POKEMON?!

attributes.title: No Man's Sky Last Minute DELAY; HUGE Changes in the Game
attributes.description: The craziest final week of game development ever for Hello Games is over, giving us a delay for No Man's Sky on PC... But also a huge day zero update that changes the entire game.
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky Last Minute DELAY; HUGE Changes in the Game

attributes.title: Pokemon GO BANNED
attributes.description: Pokemon GO just got Pokemon NO'd in Iran, making it the first country to ban the game since its launch last month. And that's not all that's happened in the last month either, as Niantic just hit a record-shattering number.

attributes.title: MORE YOUTUBE ORIGINALS? - The Know
attributes.caption: "Sewercide what?!
attributes.description: YouTube is investing in more original content. What does this mean for the future of online media's largest creator-driven platform?     Hosted by:    @BruceGreene    @AdamKovic    @JamesWillems    Written by:    @ElyseWillems

attributes.title: PS4 Neo Gets MORE Powerful to Fight Scorpio?
attributes.description: Do we have the reveal dates for both the PS4 Neo and the Nintendo NX? Is Sony considering beefing up the Neo because it's worried about Scorpio? Is cake more delicious than pie? We'll answer a couple of these questions, and maybe some other ones.
attributes.display_title: PS4 Neo Gets MORE Powerful to Fight Scorpio?

attributes.title: No Man's Sky: Multiplayer Or Not?
attributes.description: After years of double talk and mixed messages from Hello Games, two players have done the impossible and met up in No Man's Sky. Or at least they tried to, and now the internet is upset about it
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky: Multiplayer Or Not?

attributes.title: PS4 Neo Reveal SOON?! - The Know
attributes.caption: Ohboyohboyohboyohboy!
attributes.description: Does this count as an announcement of an announcement? Not technically. It's the IMPLICATION of an announcement of an announcement. Welcome to gaming news.  Written By: Lawrence Sonntag    Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, James Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: PS4 Neo Reveal SOON?! - The Know

attributes.title: People Choose Pokemon Over SEX?!
attributes.caption: Aug 11, 2016
attributes.description: Look, we all like Pokemon Go. But some of us like it more than others. Some of us like it more than SEX. We're looking at you, UK.

attributes.title: DDoS Attacks Over No Man's Sky Reviews
attributes.caption: Aug 12, 2016
attributes.description: Thinking about writing a bad review of a game the internet is going crazy for? You might just find yourself on the business end of an angry DDoS attack. Because nothing says serious business like reviewing video games.
attributes.display_title: DDoS Attacks Over No Man's Sky Reviews

attributes.title: Pokemon GO and LoL Vs Cheaters
attributes.caption: Aug 12 , 2016
attributes.description: Pokemon GO is cracking down on GPS spoofing and Riot Games is suing people who created cheats for League of Legends. Free to play developers don't play around with their microtransactions.
attributes.display_title: Pokemon GO and LoL Vs Cheaters

attributes.title: No Man's Sky Coming to Xbox One?
attributes.caption: Aug 15, 2016
attributes.description: No Man's Sky is finally out on PC and PS4, but new details suggest it could actually be coming to Xbox One as well. Maybe they should have called it No Man's Exclusive instead.
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky Coming to Xbox One?

attributes.title: Final Fantasy 15 DELAYED - Here's Why! - The Know
attributes.caption: If Lawrence is willing to wait, so can you.
attributes.description: Looks like you'll have to reschedule that stomach flu you were planning on getting. Final Fantasy XV is officially delayed, but at least we know why!
attributes.display_title: Final Fantasy 15 DELAYED - Here's Why! - The Know

attributes.title: Fallout New Orleans?
attributes.caption: Aug 15, 2016
attributes.description: A trademark just hit the tubes for Fallout New Orleans. Could we be playing a new Fallout game where we flash people for beads? Let's hope!

attributes.title: Titanfall 2 Beta SKIPS PC!
attributes.description: Titanfall 2's got a beta coming at you... unless you're a PC gamer that is. Is EA going to pull off a PC launch without a beta, or are they just totally crazy?

attributes.title: No Man's Sky Gets PAID DLC?
attributes.caption: Aug 17, 2016
attributes.description: It's only been one week since launch, and already the creator of No Man's Sky is reversing on his position that the game's DLC will always be free. That's going to over really well.
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky Gets PAID DLC?

attributes.title: Metal Gear Survive: The ZOMBIE Franchise?!
attributes.caption: Aug 17,2016
attributes.description: Stop the presses! Konami just announced the first non-Kojima Metal Gear game... and it's just about as Konami as you'd expect it to be. Let's just say there are zombies. And wormholes.
attributes.display_title: Metal Gear Survive: The ZOMBIE Franchise?!

attributes.title: Scorpio Is Microsoft's LAST Console Generation?
attributes.caption: Aug 18, 2016
attributes.description: Is Microsoft Scorpio the Xbox's swan song? The company now says that they expect Scorpio to usher in the very last generation of Xbox consoles.
attributes.display_title: Scorpio Is Microsoft's LAST Console Generation?

attributes.title: Tekken 7 Swimsuits Are TOO SEXY?
attributes.caption: Aug 18, 2016
attributes.description: Time for more sexy video game news! Tekken 7's director has finally fired back at all the people who criticized the game for having sexy swimsuits.

attributes.title: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided: Is It Good?
attributes.caption: Aug 19, 2016
attributes.description: It's been 5 years since Adam Jensen didn't ask for this. Deus Ex Mankind Divided reviews are finally out, so it's time to ask the age-old question: Is It Good?
attributes.display_title: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided: Is It Good?

attributes.title: No Man's Sky FIXED?
attributes.caption: Aug 19, 2016
attributes.description: Between No Man's Sky's big PC patch and the sudden mod community springing up around the game, could we finally be getting what we were hoping for all along?

attributes.title: PS4 Slim LEAKED
attributes.caption: Aug 22, 2016
attributes.description: We might not be getting one, but TWO new PlayStation 4s announced at the PS Meeting, according to some new leaks over the weekend. The PS4 slim is out in the wild and all but confirmed now... do you think you'll get one?

attributes.title: No Man's Sky Did It FAIL?
attributes.caption: Aug 23, 2016
attributes.description: No Man's Sky had a huge drop-off in sales for its second week, and now the internet's claiming the game is a commercial failure. We decided to take a look at the numbers and see for ourselves.
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky Did It FAIL?

attributes.title: Playstation Games Coming To PC!
attributes.caption: Aug 24, 2016
attributes.description: PlayStation is jumping over to PC? Soon the master race will be able to turn those ridiculous iceberg-cooled GPU engines to the task of streaming PS3 games... because why not?

attributes.title: No Man's Sky TOP 5 MODS! - The Know
attributes.caption: These should ease your pain a bit.
attributes.description: Before you take the easy burn, no there's not a mod that adds multiplayer. Actually go ahead and leave it in the comments anyway, it's not like anyone reads these things.
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky TOP 5 MODS! - The Know

attributes.title: Titanfall 2: Huge Changes
attributes.caption: Aug 24, 2016
attributes.description: How do you make sure that fans love your beta for Titanfall 2? You change everything that they loved about the first game! Oh wait, don't do that. They'll get really mad about it. Like, really mad.

attributes.title: Facebook Is The New Steam
attributes.caption: Aug 25,2016
attributes.description: Valve's dominated PC gaming for years, but now a new challenger arrives! And it's... Facebook, who is apparently gearing up to get in the PC gaming business with their own desktop platform.

attributes.title: PS4 Game Steals Assets
attributes.caption: Aug 25, 2016
attributes.description: Oops. Looks like an indie PS4 game may not have been so homegrown at all. Come hear the saga of Solbrain, an RPG lovingly crafted from a bunch of other games you've probably already played.

attributes.title: Battlefield 1 Premium Pass: WORTH IT or RIP OFF?
attributes.caption: Aug 26, 2016
attributes.description: Is Battlefield 1's $50 Premium Pass worth the price, or is it just EA getting back up to its old tricks? EA announced where some of your $50 is going, but it might be awhile before you actually get to play it.
attributes.display_title: Battlefield 1 Premium Pass: WORTH IT or RIP OFF?

attributes.title: NX WON'T FAIL, Nintendo Promises "To Do Better"
attributes.caption: Aug 26, 2016
attributes.description: Nintendo's saying that they'll do a much better job with the NX, plus we've got a ton of other rumors from multiple sources about the nature of the NX controllers.
attributes.display_title: NX WON'T FAIL, Nintendo Promises "To Do Better"

attributes.title: No Man's Sky REFUNDS for Everyone!
attributes.caption: Aug 29, 2016
attributes.description: Major retailers went lax on their refund policies this weekend, prompting thousands of No Man's Sky returns on Steam, PSN, and Amazon. At what point is it OK to request your money back? Asking for a friend.
attributes.display_title: No Man's Sky REFUNDS for Everyone!

attributes.title: The LAW Comes to Pokemon Go
attributes.caption: Aug 29, 2016
attributes.description: If people keep playing Pokemon GO on the road in California, the only place they'll be catching 'em all is in prison. That's because California lawmakers have proposed a law to make it illegal to drive while capturing Pokemon.
attributes.display_title: The LAW Comes to Pokemon Go

attributes.title: PS4 NEO Design & Price LEAKED?
attributes.caption: Aug 30, 2016
attributes.description: We're just one week away from what might be the announcement of the PS4 Neo... which means there's still plenty of time for more stuff to leak! Some new leaks might have given us some hints about the PS4 Neo's design, as well as its price.

attributes.title: Pewdiepie Wants to Make You FAMOUS... in Tuber Simulator
attributes.caption: Aug 30, 2016
attributes.description: PewDiePie just announced his SECOND video game in development, Tuber Simulator. It's based on a game that's based on his life, and it's all about getting more famous than PewDiePie himself.
attributes.display_title: Pewdiepie Wants to Make You FAMOUS... in Tuber Simulator

attributes.title: People ALREADY Disappointed by PS4 Pro
attributes.description: We're only 24 hours out from the announcement of the PS4 Pro, and already people are upset about resolutions, framerates, and who knows what else at this point. Is the console enough of an upgrade to justify the price?
attributes.display_title: People ALREADY Disappointed by PS4 Pro

attributes.title: Steam Hit by PATENT TROLL
attributes.caption: Aug 31, 2016
attributes.description: The internet's got a new troll to deal with: the oldest telecommunications company in the world. They're going after Valve and Steam for violating a bunch of patents and they want all those sweet Steam bucks to compensate.

attributes.title: Can Mario on Phones SAVE Nintendo!?
attributes.description: Super Mario Run is going to be downloaded a BILLION times? That's the number, according to one crazy analyst... who might actually have a point.
attributes.display_title: Can Mario on Phones SAVE Nintendo!?

attributes.title: Battlefield 1 ATTACKED
attributes.caption: Sept 1, 2016
attributes.description: The Battlefield 1 public beta kicked off with all kinds of fireworks, including DDoS attacks that had the whole thing tangled up for up to 10 hours. Stick with it! Gotta get that horse combat!

attributes.title: Sony Charging for PS4 Pro Game Updates?
attributes.description: The internet's freaking out that Sony might charge gamers over patches for the PS4 Pro! Don't worry, they're not going to do that, but it sounds like they ARE charging developers, which still isn't very good for gamers.
attributes.display_title: Sony Charging for PS4 Pro Game Updates?

attributes.title: Nintendo DMCAs 562 Fan Games
attributes.caption: Sept 2, 2016
attributes.description: Nintendo's up to their old DMCA tricks again. Only this time, they managed to knock out more than 500 fan games all at the same time. They probably earned a couple of 1-ups for that.

attributes.title: Mod Support CANCELLED on PS4
attributes.caption: Sept 10, 2016
attributes.description: Remember when you bought your PS4 version of Fallout 4 and you were super excited for mods? Hold onto that feeling, because it's the last fuzzy one you'll ever have. We're now in the darkest timeline, where that feature has been cancelled! And for Skyrim HD too! WHAT HATH PLAYSTATION WROUGHT?!

attributes.title: PAID DLC for an EARLY ACCESS Game!?
attributes.caption: Sept 2, 2016
attributes.description: What's better than paying for a game that's not finished? Paying for DLC for a game that's not finished, obviously. Ark: Survival Evolved knows what you want, and they're giving it to you, whether you like it or not.
attributes.display_title: PAID DLC for an EARLY ACCESS Game!?

attributes.title: PS4 Pro COMPETES with PC!?
attributes.description: Sony's so far ahead in the current generation of consoles they don't even see Xbox as competition for PS4 anymore. Instead, they want PS4 Pro to take on Gaben and the army of Steam.

attributes.title: VR is DEAD?
attributes.caption: Sept 6, 2016
attributes.description: Look, we need to talk about VR. We get it. We've talked about it constantly on The Patch. We all have it and we love it. But that's not the case for everyone. In fact, it's not the case for MOST people. This new frontier of gaming could be in some real trouble.

attributes.title: Nintendo Switch 40% Portable?
attributes.caption: Dec 19, 2016
attributes.description: Ahead of Nintendo's official event, rumors are flying fast and heavy. A new report out of Digital Foundry claims that the Nintendo Switch will only run at 40% of its GPU power when it's in portable mode, and that could mean headaches for developers.

attributes.title: The Last Guardian Delayed AGAIN!? - The Know
attributes.caption: Noooooo! I hate everything!
attributes.description: Oh no, not for the eighteenth time! I told myself seventeen was IT. What am I supposed to do without my precious dogbird?  The Last Guardian E3 2009 Announcement:   Written By: Lawrence Sonntag  Hosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag
attributes.display_title: The Last Guardian Delayed AGAIN!? - The Know

attributes.title: Sony COPYING Pokemon Go?
attributes.caption: Sept 6, 2016
attributes.description: Pokemon Go has been such a commercial success that others are taking notice. Specifically, Ridge Racer superfan Kaz Hirai, who wants Sony to aggressively go after the mobile market and get some of those poke-dollars.

attributes.title: Steam Review Changes DESTROYING Indie Devs?
attributes.caption: Sept 13, 2016
attributes.description: Steam is making tweaks to the review system to cut down on corrupt developers gaming the system, but they may be destroying indie developers in the process... at least, that's how the indie devs feel.
attributes.display_title: Steam Review Changes DESTROYING Indie Devs?

attributes.title: YouTuber ARRESTED for Pokemon GO?
attributes.caption: Sept 7, 2016
attributes.description: In Soviet Russia, Pokemon Catches You. And that's exactly what's happened to one YouTuber, who's facing years in prison for playing Pokemon Go in a Russian church. Pokemon No!

attributes.title: Kojima's Death Stranding FIRST DETAILS! - The Know
attributes.caption: So much naked Reedus!
attributes.description: Death Stranding is like a butterfly with one wing. It's beautiful, but it can't flap around and land on flowers. So tragic, so beautiful. We love you Kojima.                                   SOURCES:Kojima's TGS Presentation: Cook Some Eggs:         Written By: Lawrence SonntagHosted By: Adam Kovic, Bruce Greene, Elyse Willems, and Lawrence Sonntag                .
attributes.display_title: Kojima's Death Stranding FIRST DETAILS! - The Know

attributes.title: Playstation 4 PRO Announced!
attributes.caption: Sept 7, 2016
attributes.description: Continuing the long tradition of super cool code names and slightly underwhelming official product names, the PS4 Neo has officially been unveiled as... PS4 Pro. Here's everything we know about it based on the announcements today.

attributes.title: PlayStation Hit With Layoffs
attributes.caption: Sept 15, 2016
attributes.description: When it rains, it pours. And right now it seems like there's a storm cloud hanging over PlayStation. Two of the company's development studios have been hit with heavy lay-offs. Even their new VR efforts are feeling the knife, and some of their upcoming games may be quietly axed.

attributes.title: The Last Guardian DISAPPOINTING?
attributes.caption: Sept 15, 2016
attributes.description: The Last Guardian may be delayed, but it's still playable at Tokyo Game Show. Unfortunately, impressions of the game are less than favorable and they're not the kind of issues that could be solved by December...

attributes.title: Steam Gamers SUED for Negative Comments!
attributes.caption: Sept 16, 2016
attributes.description: You guys thought key activation reviews not counting towards a game's score on Steam was bad? Try getting sued for leaving negative comments! That's exactly what's happening to more than 100 gamers... and that may be surprising, until you realize it's the studio Digital Homicide behind it. Then it all makes sense.
attributes.display_title: Steam Gamers SUED for Negative Comments!

attributes.title: PlayStation Throws No Man's Sky Under the Bus
attributes.caption: Sept 16, 2016
attributes.description: Gamers aren't the only ones who feel like Hello Games messed up big time with No Man's Sky. Even Sony's Shuhei Yoshida thinks the game over promised and under delivered.
attributes.display_title: PlayStation Throws No Man's Sky Under the Bus

attributes.title: Kojima BLASTS New Metal Gear's Zombies
attributes.caption: Sept 19, 2016
attributes.description: Kojima's been pretty quiet on the whole business with Konami, but that's all changing now. He's put Metal Gear Survive on blast for being unrealistic for the Metal Gear universe.
attributes.display_title: Kojima BLASTS New Metal Gear's Zombies

attributes.title: Developer BANNED From Steam
attributes.caption: Sept 19, 2016
attributes.description: Remember last week when developer Digital Homicide tried to sue Steam users for leaving negative comments about their games and tried to drag Valve into it? Well, this is the gift that keeps on giving...

attributes.title: PS4 Pro's Backwards Compatibility SUCKS?
attributes.caption: Kinda, yeah, a little, maybe?
attributes.description: Take THAT, Sony ponies. All hail the X-bots or whatever the Internet calls them these days.

attributes.title: Nintendo Switch Price LEAKED?
attributes.caption: Shut up and take our money!
attributes.description: Hoo doggie that's a low price. Given that Nintendo likes to make a profit on their hardware, do these leaked prices even make sense?

attributes.title: Reviews: Don't Buy a PS4 Pro?
attributes.caption: Take that, Poindexter!
attributes.description: Say it ain't so, reviewers! We were all amped up to spray Sony with our money and now this. Maybe if we look hard enough we can find a reason to buy it anyway.
attributes.display_title: Reviews: Don't Buy a PS4 Pro?
